articles.title: You can’t trust your eyes to tell you what’s real anymore, says the head of Instagram
articles.description: Instagram boss Adam Mosseri is closing out 2025 with a 20-images-deep dive into what a new era of "infinite synthetic content" means as it all becomes harder and harder to distinguish from reality, and the old, more personal Instagram feed that he says has been "dead" for years. Last year, The Verge's Sarah Jeong wrote […]
articles.author: Richard Lawler

articles.title: Net neutrality was back, until it wasn’t
articles.description: The fight for net neutrality never seems to be truly won or lost. Federal net neutrality rules have been on and off for the past 15 years. The Federal Communications Commission (FCC) passed the Open Internet Order under President Barack Obama in 2010, prohibiting ISPs from blocking or throttling lawful internet traffic, the baseline rule […]
articles.author: Stevie Bonifield

articles.title: Leaked video shows the Galaxy S26 Ultra’s new camera island
articles.description: New photos and video seem to confirm previous leaks hinting that the Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra will sport a new camera bump. OnLeaks posted images of what look like dummy phones on X, following renders it leaked back in September. We've seen a similarly raised island on the Galaxy Z Fold 7, which 9to5Google points […]
articles.author: Justine Calma

articles.title: The Dreame X40 Ultra robovac is about $700 off, nearly matching its best price
articles.description: With the year coming to a close, now’s a good time to set yourself up for a cleaner, more organized start in 2026. The Dreame X40 Ultra — one of our favorite robot vacuum deals from Black Friday — can handle most of the heavy lifting for you, and it’s once again on sale. You […]
articles.author: Sheena Vasani

articles.title: Killing in the name of… nothing
articles.description: In a good and just society, it would have been possible to bury Charlie Kirk without either threatening mass violence toward his enemies or making light of his death with a furry sex meme. But America in 2025 did not remotely resemble a working society, let alone a civil one, and Kirk's killing came prepackaged […]
articles.author: Sarah Jeong

articles.title: The 11 best Nintendo Switch 2 games we played in 2025
articles.description: 2025 was a big year for gaming, and that includes gaming hardware. Nintendo launched its Switch 2 console in June, and since then, numerous Switch 2 titles and noteworthy updates for original Switch games have launched. These include brand-new Nintendo experiences like Mario Kart World and Donkey Kong Bananza, as well as some belated but […]
articles.author: Cameron Faulkner
